Doom Ice growled as her ship is hit. Deemos is knocked over, but Psuedo was
blasted to the groud violently. Deemos stood up.

"Idiots, I do not surrender! I just want those 2 and then I shall leave your
pathetic Predacons alone!" Deemos said, pointing at Psueod and Land Mine...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, September 06, 2000 8:48 PM
Subject: Party's Over, Maximals!


>
> ::Reptilica/DevilDuer/Bloodystrike::
>
> "Party's over, Maximals!" Reptilica's voice sounds over the battlefield as
he
> flies in, firing a missile. The missile hits behind Deemos, sending dirt
and
> rocks flying toward the Maximal.
>
> "That was a warning shot. If you don't get otta here, a few more are gonna
> hit a few of you," he says, firing two more missiles, these ones aimed at
> Deemos. He activates his comm-link, setting it to transmitt to both
Predacon
> and Alliance frequences.
>
> "Everyone," he says into it, "Zardus sent us here to help the Preds. Fire
> only on Maximal signatures." The command was meant for the Alliance, the
> explanation for the Preds.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> DevilDuer runs jumps out into the clearing, transforming in the air, and
> firing his pistol at Infectra.
>
> "Run, Maxi! While ya can!" he yells, firing repetedly at her.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Bloodystrike flies into the scene, a heavy-fire rifle in one hand and a
> rapid-fire one in the other. He opens fire on Doom Ice's ship, five shots
> from the heavy-fire and 13 from the automatic.
>
> "Zardus, we've engaged the Maxi's," he says into his comm, sending the
> transmission to Zardus.
>
>
>
